content.title: Upcoming Webinars
description: ​Using ChatGPT & AI Tools for Writing Law Firm Marketing Content: The Good, The Bad, The Ugly

Want to learn more about how ChatGPT and other AI models can help your law firm create marketing content? Join members of the Justia team as we explore how ChatGPT produces content, why lawyers should be mindful of factual inaccuracies in AI content, and more!

content.title: Recent Recordings
description: ​Fast-Mover Advantage: Law Marketing Ethics Issue in a Race for Clients

Law firms struggle to compete in a world where attorney ethical standards and enforcement vary from state to state, and the legal marketplace is increasingly fast-paced. Stream this on-demand presentation in which Attorney Micah Buchdahl leads a webinar discussing legal marketing and ethics in this landscape.
Write Like the Best Legal Writers

Ready to improve your legal writing skills in 2023? Watch this on-demand presentation offering insights into the craft of legal writing, how lawyers can improve their legal writing skills, and why writing matters.
